rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with Vastu compliant orientation. Includes reception area and waiting space.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open plan area designed for family gatherings and dining, integrated with the kitchen area.

rooms.name: Traditional Kerala Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional layout including a cooking area, storage, and pantry space, following Kerala architectural styles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with private balcony, offering south-east to north-west orientation to balance energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom designed for privacy and relaxation.

rooms.name: Kids Bedroom
rooms.description: Dedicated children's room with playful interior decor while incorporating traditional Kerala elements.

rooms.name: Second Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with ample natural light and view.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-designed bathroom space with traditional Kerala elements.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space optimized for work and privacy.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Well-equipped private gym designed according to health standards and local building norms.
